description:
KDE Plasma 6.3.1 is now available as the first maintenance update to the latest KDE Plasma 6.3 desktop environment series with numerous bug fixes and a few improvements.

The post KDE Plasma 6.3.1 Released with Plasma Discover Improvements and Many Bug Fixes appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: KDE Plasma 6.3.1 Released with Plasma Discover Improvements and Many Bug Fixes
